caption.p: Chest roentgenogram findings. Each image has ground-glass opacity in the lower lung fields on both sides. a Image taken on June 2, 20XX, in the standing position, tube voltage of 130 kV, and tube current of 250 mA. b Image taken on June 22, 20XX, in the standing position, tube voltage of 130 kV, and current of 250 mA
